headline: GE Vernova Alliance And Acquisition Sharpen Focus On Grid Investment
summary: GE Vernova (NYSE:GEV) has signed a Strategic Alliance Agreement with Xcel Energy to work together on grid modernization and renewables projects. The agreement covers collaboration on utility scale gas and wind equipment, along with grid modernization initiatives. GE Vernova has completed the full acquisition of Prolec GE, consolidating its electrification capacity in North America. GE Vernova focuses on power equipment, grid solutions, and cleaner generation technologies. This new agreement...
